FORMULA_TEXT:
DEFAULT FOR DATA_ELEMENTS IS EMPTY_TEXT_TEXT
INPUTS ARE DATA_ELEMENTS (TEXT_TEXT)


L_VALUE=' '
(if (DATA_ELEMENTS.EXISTS('FLSA_JOB_CODE') AND DATA_ELEMENTS.EXISTS('FLSA_Status')) then ( 
P_JOB_CODE = DATA_ELEMENTS['FLSA_JOB_CODE']
P_FLSA_STATUS = DATA_ELEMENTS['FLSA_Status']

L_VALUE = GET_VALUE_SET('AXE_HR_I022_SCREENING_PKG_VS','|=FLSA_JOB_CODE='''||P_JOB_CODE||''''||'|FLSA_Status='''||P_FLSA_STATUS||''''))
  
if ( NOT ISNULL(L_VALUE)='Y')  then
(L_VALUE=GET_VALUE_SET('AXE_HR_I022_SCREENING_PKG_VS','|=FLSA_JOB_CODE='''||'DEFAULT'||''''||'|FLSA_Status='''||P_FLSA_STATUS||''''))
RULE_VALUE = L_VALUE )


RETURN RULE_VALUE
